arts.ttl: Ibrahima Konate reveals touching gift, contract talks and bold Virgil van Dijk claim
arts.sum: Liverpool face Lille in their penultimate Champions League group stage fixture with French defender Ibrahima Konate now back in action - although not at 100 percent himself - and mulling over a new contract

arts.ttl: 'No one is better': Ibrahima Konate names the Liverpool ace who's easily the best in the world in his position
Liverpool's Ibrahima Konate makes major contract admission as defender provides update on Anfield future
arts.sum: Liverpool defender Ibrahima Konate provides an update on his Anfield future after entering the final 18 months of his deal.

arts.ttl: Ibrahima KonatÃ© reveals he is latest Liverpool star still to sign new contract
arts.sum: Centre-half was offered extension three months ago Salah, Van Dijk and Alexander-Arnold deals also in doubt Ibrahima KonatÃ© is the latest Liverpool player to deliberate over his future after confirming the clubâ€™s offer of a new contract remains unsigned. The France international has 18 months on his deal and was offered an extension more than three months ago. Liverpool are in a precarious position with Mohamed Salah, Virgil van Dijk and Trent Alexander-Arnold, all of whom are in the final six months of their contracts and free to sign a pre-contract agreement with a foreign club. arts.ttl: Ibrahima Konate reveals he HAS received a new contract offer from Liverpool - as he opens up on playing through the pain barrier
arts.sum: Liverpool defender Ibrahima Konate admits he still has a contract issue to resolve but is demonstrating his commitment to the club by playing through pain.

arts.ttl: Ibrahima Konate committed to Liverpool despite unresolved contract situation
